professional.name: Resume
professional.blurb: Previously at Grooveshark, Plex, and LIV Inc. Beyond web, mobile app, and game development, I have experience with scaling projects, freelance work, product prototyping, and UX design. Resume can be found here.

professional.name: CodeMentor
professional.blurb: In my spare time I make myself available on CodeMentor, teaching and explaining different aspects of coding 1:1 with those looking for help.

projects.name: Sketches
projects.blurb: A set of experiments using canvas-sketch and Three.js

projects.name: Overwatch UI elements
projects.blurb: A series of React components modeling elements of Overwatch's design. Styled with simple HTML/CSS. Easily importable.

projects.name: CSS Visualizers
projects.blurb: Music visualizers made entirely from DOM elements and CSS3. No SVG, Canvas, or WebGL used. Live Demo.

talks.name: The Accessibility of Programming
talks.blurb: Exploring why learning to program seems to be so scary and how easy it can be to learn. Given at Gainesville Barcamp, Nov 2014.

talks.name: React, Flux, and a little Redux
talks.blurb: A discussion about the current state of web app development, and the direction modern frameworks are heading. Given at the Gainesville JS meetup, downtown in the Hackerspace, Aug 2015.
